thread.section_title: Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful View, Great Value, Excellent all Around!
thread.title_full: Beautiful View, Great Value, Excellent all Around! - Review of Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Barbiturik
title: Beautiful View, Great Value, Excellent all Around!
text:
A true gem in the heart of Champ de Mars. Walking distance to the Eiffel Tower. Metro station very close, Carrefour nearby, fresh bakery around the corner.
Super friendly staff, the check-in concierge gave me a room with such view at no extra charge, and oh boy, what a view!
Comfortable, clean beds, modern, roomy bathroom, lovely, lovely place. Will book again!
